morningBrief.headline: Major System Approaching
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 6" over the last week. Lift lines were mellow yesterday. Expect a similar vibe today. Big things coming. 6" in the forecast. Might be time to plan ahead.

morningBrief.headline: Time to Call in Sick
morningBrief.body: Powder alert: 7" of fresh overnight means soft conditions across the mountain. The whole mountain is basically open. Go explore. Heads up: Highlands Gondola peaked at 24 minutes yesterday. Consider alternatives.

morningBrief.headline: The Map Exploded
morningBrief.body: 3" settled in while you were sleeping. Groomers are smooth, off-piste is soft. Ski patrol went absolutely huge: 27 new runs available today. Watch for crowds at #7 TC Express, which saw 11-minute waits yesterday.

morningBrief.headline: Variable Conditions
morningBrief.body: 41/57 trails spinning, 20 freshly groomed. 34Â° and Rain/Snow. 4 more trails opened today, expanding your options. Transition weather: rain turning to snow as you climb. Variable conditions throughout.

morningBrief.headline: Terrain Update
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 11" over the last week. Ski patrol opened 6 additional trails. A few more choices today. Heads up: Whistler Village Gondola  - Lower peaked at 40 minutes yesterday. Consider alternatives.

morningBrief.headline: Peak Season Mode
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 8" over the last week. Peak terrain status: almost everything is available today. Windy conditions expected. Upper lifts may have holds or delays.

morningBrief.headline: Big Snow Incoming
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 9" over the last week. The terrain list grew by 7 today. More variety to choose from. The weather models are locked in: 21" of snow heading our way.

morningBrief.headline: Major System Approaching
morningBrief.body: The snow from earlier this week is aging gracefully. Still soft, still fun. Ski patrol opened 16 new runs. Major expansion today. A significant storm is brewing with 22" expected over the next few days.
